Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $180 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value to you. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you need more information to make a decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
